item.name: Country, State, City & Address
item.description: APIs for managing all country, state, city

request.description:
If everything is okay, you'll get a `200` OK response with data.

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and a response not found!



<aside class="notice">basepath/api/v1/get-all-country</aside>

response.body:
{
"status": true,
"status_code": 200,

]
}

request.description:
If everything is okay, you'll get a `200` OK response with data.

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and a response not found!

"country_id":1
}

request.description:
If everything is okay, you'll get a `200` OK response with data.

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and a response not found!

 {
"country_id":101,
"state_id":4037
}
<aside class="notice">basepath/api/v1/get-all-city-by-state-and-country</aside>

If everything is okay, you'll get a `200` OK response with data.

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and a response not found!

 {
"user_id":4037,
"address_id":45,
}
<aside class="notice">basepath/api/v1/get-all-user-address</aside>

body.raw: {"*user_id":1,"*flat_house_no":"ABC123 in JSON BODY","*address1":"ABC in JSON BODY","*address2":"ABC in JSON BODY","*street":"ABC in JSON BODY","*landmark":"ABC in JSON BODY","*city":"ABC in JSON BODY","*state":"ABC in JSON BODY","*country":"ABC in JSON BODY","*zip":"ABC in JSON BODY","*location":"'home\/work\/others' in JSON BODY"}

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and a response not found!

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and a response not found!

"user_id":21213
}

If everything is okay, you'll get a `200` OK response with data.

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and a response not found!

item.name: Login, Register
item.description: APIs for managing all Auth Related

request.description:
If everything is okay, you'll get a `200` OK response with data.

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and a response not found!

EX
 {
"name":"Abc",
"email":"You@domain.com",
"mobile":"9899****54",
"password":"Abc@12345"
}
<aside class="notice">basepath/api/v1/register</aside>

If everything is okay, you'll get a `200` OK response with data.

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and a response not found!

EX
 {
"email_id":"You@domain.com",
"password":"Abc@12345"
}
 <aside class="notice">basepath/api/v1/login</aside>

If everything is okay, you'll get a `200` OK response with data.

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and a response not found!


<aside class="notice">basepath/api/v1/forgot-pass</aside>

If everything is okay, you'll get a `200` OK response with data.

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and a response not found!


<aside class="notice">basepath/api/v1/forgot-password-change</aside>

item.name: User Profile Related
item.description: APIs for managing all user's profile related

request.description:
If everything is okay, you'll get a `200` OK response with data.

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and Profile not found and token related response...

EX
 {
"user_id":1
}

<aside class="notice">basepath/api/v1/get-user-profile</aside>

body.raw: {"*user_id":1,"*current_password":"1,2,3 in JSON BODY","*new_password":"1,2,3 in JSON BODY","*retype_password":"1,2,3 in JSON BODY"}

request.description:
If everything is okay, you'll get a `200` OK response with data.

Otherwise, the request will fail with a `404` error, and Oops, something went wrong...

EX
 {
"user_id":1,
"current_password":"Abc@123456789",
"new_password":"Abc@12345",
"retype_password":"Abc@12345"
}
<aside class="notice">basepath/api/v1/change-password</aside>
